p: However, it is noteworthy that the E α varies in a narrower range (about 10 kJ/mol) with respect to α compared to the range reported for other epoxy-amine systems [ 34]. Values around 50 kJ/mol were obtained, which are in good agreement with Kissinger and Ozawa model-fitting kinetics values and literature data for the autocatalytic reaction of an epoxy–amine system [ 35]. The rate-determining steps for autocatalytic reactions correspond to the formation of a trimolecular transition state amine–epoxy–hydroxyl, maybe as shown in Figure 8, where HX represents a hydrogen-bond donor.
